questions.question: What is your company's name and what is its one-line tagline?
What is the primary problem, need, or opportunity your company addresses?
Who is your primary target audience or customer segment?
What are the current alternatives or solutions your target audience uses?
In one sentence, what is your solution?
What are the key features of your product/service?
Can you provide a link to a demo, or describe what a mockup would look like?
What is the Total Addressable Market (TAM) for your solution?
What is your Serviceable Available Market (SAM)?
What is your Serviceable Obtainable Market (SOM)?
What is your current monthly revenue?
How many active users do you have?
Do you have any pilot programs or key partnerships?
What is your user growth rate month-over-month?
Who are the founders of your company?
What is the relevant experience of your core team members?
Why is your team the right one to solve this problem?
Who are your main competitors?
How much money are you raising?
How will you use the funds?
